verses.text: A prayer of Moses \w the|strong="H0387"\w* man of God. Lord, thou hast been our refuge from generation to generation.

\w Before|strong="H3045"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* mountains \w were|strong="H7891"\w* \w made|strong="H3045"\w*, \w or|strong="H6310"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* earth \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* world \w was|strong="H3068"\w* formed; \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w eternity|strong="H5769"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w eternity|strong="H5769"\w* thou art \w God|strong="H3068"\w*.

Turn \w not|strong="H3588"\w* man away \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w be|strong="H8064"\w* brought low: \w and|strong="H8064"\w* thou hast \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Be|strong="H8064"\w* converted, \w O|strong="H1129"\w* ye sons \w of|strong="H0559"\w* \w men|strong="H0559"\w*.

\w For|strong="H5650"\w* \w a|strong="H3772"\w* thousand years \w in|strong="H5650"\w* thy sight \w are|strong="H5650"\w* as yesterday, which \w is|strong="H5650"\w* past. \w And|strong="H5650"\w* as \w a|strong="H3772"\w* watch \w in|strong="H5650"\w* \w the|strong="H3772"\w* night,
Things \w that|strong="H5704"\w* \w are|strong="H3678"\w* \w counted|strong="H3559"\w* nothing, \w shall|strong="H2233"\w* \w their|strong="H3559"\w* years \w be|strong="H5769"\w*.

\w In|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* morning man \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* grow up \w like|strong="H8064"\w* grass; \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* morning \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* flourish \w and|strong="H3068"\w* pass away: \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* evening \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* fall, grow dry, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* wither.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* thy wrath \w we|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H1121"\w* fainted away: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* troubled \w in|strong="H3068"\w* thy indignation.

Thou hast set \w our|strong="H3605"\w* iniquities \w before|strong="H5921"\w* thy eyes: \w our|strong="H3605"\w* life \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* light \w of|strong="H5921"\w* thy countenance.

\w For|strong="H6635"\w* \w all|strong="H5439"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* days \w are|strong="H3068"\w* spent; \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* thy wrath we \w have|strong="H3068"\w* fainted away. \w Our|strong="H3068"\w* years \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* considered \w as|strong="H3644"\w* \w a|strong="H3644"\w* spider:

\w The|strong="H4910"\w* days \w of|strong="H3220"\w* \w our|strong="H0859"\w* years \w in|strong="H3220"\w* \w them|strong="H0859"\w* \w are|strong="H0859"\w* threescore \w and|strong="H3220"\w* ten years. \w But|strong="H0859"\w* if \w in|strong="H3220"\w* \w the|strong="H4910"\w* strong they \w be|strong="H3220"\w* fourscore years: \w and|strong="H3220"\w* what is more \w of|strong="H3220"\w* \w them|strong="H0859"\w* is labour \w and|strong="H3220"\w* sorrow. For mildness is come upon us: \w and|strong="H3220"\w* we \w shall|strong="H4910"\w* \w be|strong="H3220"\w* corrected.
Who knoweth \w the|strong="H6340"\w* \w power|strong="H5797"\w* \w of|strong="H2220"\w* thy anger, \w and|strong="H5797"\w* \w for|strong="H1792"\w* thy fear
Can number thy wrath? \w So|strong="H0637"\w* \w make|strong="H3245"\w* thy right hand known: \w and|strong="H0776"\w* men learned \w in|strong="H0776"\w* heart, \w in|strong="H0776"\w* wisdom.
Return, \w O|strong="H0859"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3225"\w*, how long? \w and|strong="H6828"\w* \w be|strong="H8034"\w* entreated \w in|strong="H8034"\w* favour \w of|strong="H8034"\w* thy servants.

We \w are|strong="H3027"\w* filled \w in|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H5973"\w* morning \w with|strong="H5973"\w* thy mercy: \w and|strong="H3027"\w* we \w have|strong="H3027"\w* rejoiced, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w are|strong="H3027"\w* delighted all \w our|strong="H5973"\w* days.

We \w have|strong="H0571"\w* rejoiced \w for|strong="H4941"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* days \w in|strong="H6440"\w* which thou hast humbled \w us|strong="H6440"\w*: \w for|strong="H4941"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* years \w in|strong="H6440"\w* which we \w have|strong="H0571"\w* seen evils.
Look upon thy servants \w and|strong="H1980"\w* upon \w their|strong="H3068"\w* works: \w and|strong="H1980"\w* direct \w their|strong="H3068"\w* children.

\w And|strong="H3117"\w* \w let|strong="H1523"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* brightness \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Lord \w our|strong="H3605"\w* God \w be|strong="H8034"\w* upon \w us|strong="H3117"\w*: \w and|strong="H3117"\w* direct thou \w the|strong="H3605"\w* works \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w our|strong="H3605"\w* hands \w over|strong="H3605"\w* \w us|strong="H3117"\w*; yea, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* work \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w our|strong="H3605"\w* hands \w do|strong="H3605"\w* thou direct.
